title: SweetHeart Annie missing a lot?

embed.description: League of Legends Sweetheart Annie Skin. Sponsor: Lower your ping with WTFast, FREE TRIAL AVAILABLE! http://bit.ly/WTFastSpotlights Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of Annie on their Sweetheart Skin. All footage was taken in game. This Video is a full spotlight and therefore is in 60fps when played back in supported browsers.

body:
To go with the skin theme I would've thought some changes other than the model re-texture would've come up.
Her abilities could be in the shape of hearts (with the exception of her ult)
her fire could be pink
new animations could've been added.
I'm just kinda upset as i like the skin series and this skin could've have been so much better

replies.body: Probably just wanted a cheap valentines day skin (750RP)
